DOC.brief_summary: Purpose : To determine IV acetaminophen 1 ) decrease pain pregnancy woman , 2 ) reduce amount opioid use pregnant woman encounter pain , 3 ) reduce maternal fetal adverse effect compare opioids . Design : This comparative effective trial randomize , control trial IV acetaminophen vs. IV morphine pregnant woman . Procedures : Women meet inclusion/exclusion criterion randomize IV acetaminophen IV morphine . The IV acetaminophen group get four standard dos IV acetaminophen stay hospital . The second group get six standard dos morphine . Subjects complete pain scale medication administration ask side effect .
DOC.brief_title: IV Acetaminophen v IV Morphine Pain Control Pregnant Women
DOC.detailed_description: Rationale clinical trial The goal analgesia pregnancy reduce pain minimize maternal fetal adverse effect . Current opioids use pregnancy provide minimal pain relief associate adverse effect . IV acetaminophen show significantly improve pain control follow cesarean section first stage labor . Moreover , IV acetaminophen reduces need consumption opioids follow surgery . If IV acetaminophen effective control pain associate maternal medical condition uterine contraction labor , use parenteral opiods pregnant woman exposure fetus could reduce . This could provide new opportunity medical management pain pregnancy . Thus propose comparative effectiveness trial IV acetaminophen compare IV morphine . Hypothesis : We hypothesize IV acetaminophen effective IV morphine reduce pain pregnant woman . In , IV acetaminophen reduce amount narcotic need woman pain . Objectives : To determine IV acetaminophen : 1 . Decrease pain pregnant woman 2 . Reduce amount opioid use pregnant woman encounter pain 3 . Reduce maternal fetal adverse effect compare opioids Study Design : For comparative effective trial , propose randomize , control trial IV acetaminophen vs. IV morphine pregnant woman . Prior study confirm IV acetaminophen effective control pain compare placebo . [ 14,20 ] Thus , administer placebo pain control justified time . We include 3 different group pregnant population encounter pain different reason . Group 1 : Pregnant woman uterine contraction , labor Group 2 : Pregnant woman uterine contraction first stage labor Group 3 : Pregnant woman medical condition associate pain .
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : Group 1 . We include pregnant woman great 24 week pregnancy present uterine contraction , labor warrant treatment intravenous medication pain control part routine treatment . This define presence uterine contraction document tocodynanometer . However , cervix remain less 2 cm dilate change 1 hour reexamine cervix . [ 23 ] Group 2 . We include pregnant woman great 34 week pregnancy present uterine contraction first stage labor warrant treatment intravenous medication pain control part routine treatment . This define presence uterine contraction document tocodynanometer cervical dilation great 2 cm , less 6 cm . [ 23 ] Group 3 . We include pregnant woman great 16 week pregnancy present pain due maternal medical condition include sickle cell crisis , pyelonephritis , pancreatitis , cholecystitis , nephrolithiasis headache warrant treatment intravenous medication pain control part routine treatment . Exclusion criterion : We exclude woman le 18 year age , less 16 week gestation , weight less 50 kg , contraindication acetaminophen include report elevated liver function test , hepatic injury , hepatic disorder , active liver disease , alcoholism , chronic malnutrition , know coagulapathy , hemorrhage , creatinine > 1.0 , know allergy hypersensitivity acetaminophen . We also exclude woman receive opioids within last 24 hour .
